content: a fun and customizable knit that you can make in a bunch of colours to go with all your spring and summer outfits this kerchief can be knit with two different edges and the tassel is of course optional i think a yarn with drape works best for this project but any dk or light worsted weight yarn should work the kerchief is knit bottom up the decorative top edge is optional and consists of one row of a lateral braid a row of eyelets for ribbon and is finished with a three stitch i-cord bind off for a clean and sturdy edge that also gives good symmetry with the lateral braid ties for the simple version are created by making chains with a crochet hook or you can knit i-cords a video tutorial for this pattern can be found here https //youtu be/8xz5rqxd_te
